TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit EntityFunctions extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been replaced by System.Data.Entity.DbFunctions.")

Docs.summary: Provides common language runtime (CLR) methods that expose EDM canonical functions for use in or LINQ to Entities queries.
Docs.remarks: Note that these functions have been moved to the class starting with EF6. The functions are retained here only to help in the migration of older EF apps to EF6.
